internal.content:
--- title: Starter Kits Templates --- ### Overview In the [Overview](/starterkits/overview) section we describe why _Starter Kit Templates_ provide a perfect on ramp to help projects get started. The Developer Tools project is providing a set of seed templates that can be used to get projects moving quickly and focusing on use case business logic. They cover some very common patterns for developers. We are looking forward to the community providing new open source templates for others to use with this set of developer tools. Read up on Why Start Kit Templates and if you have not already tried to deploy your first app get started.overview Starter Kit Templates Overview Deploy An App Here are links to the base set of **Starter Kit Templates** provided for the _IBM Garage for Cloud Developer Tools_. - To use the Starter Kit templates, click on the link and then the **Template** button to create a version in your own own git organization. - Then clone it onto your local machine and then use `igc pipeline` to register it with your Jenkins server. ```bash ibmcloud login | oc login kubectl get nodes | oc get nodes npm i -g @garage-catalyst/ibm-garage-cloud-cli git clone cd code package.json ! rename your project igc pipeline ``` ### Start Kit Templates Links ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png)
![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png)

--- title: Starter Kits Templates --- ### Overview In the [Overview](/starterkits/overview) section we describe why _Starter Kit Templates_ provide a perfect on ramp to help projects get started. The Developer Tools project is providing a set of seed templates that can be used to get projects moving quickly and focusing on use case business logic. They cover some very common patterns for developers. We are looking forward to the community providing new open source templates for others to use with this set of developer tools. Read up on Why Start Kit Templates and if you have not already tried to deploy your first app get started.overview Starter Kit Templates Overview Deploy An App Here are links to the base set of **Starter Kit Templates** provided for the _IBM Garage for Cloud Developer Tools_. - To use the Starter Kit templates, click on the link and then the **Template** button to create a version in your own own git organization. - Then clone it onto your local machine and then use `igc pipeline` to register it with your Jenkins server. ```bash ibmcloud login | oc login kubectl get nodes | oc get nodes npm i -g @garage-catalyst/ibm-garage-cloud-cli git clone cd code package.json ! rename your project igc pipeline ``` ### Start Kit Templates Links ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png) ![Github icon](/images/github-icon.png)
